meanings.definition: Having a sensation of spinning or being off-balance.
meanings.sent1: The merry-go-round made me feel dizzier.
meanings.sent2: The room started spinning, making me feel dizzier than before.
meanings.sent3: Trying to walk straight after spinning around made me feel even dizzier.
meanings.sent4: The constant twirling sensation in my head was dizzier than a whirlwind.
meanings.sent5: The dizzier feeling intensified as I tried to focus on a fixed point.

meanings.definition: Causing someone to feel unsteady or confused.
meanings.sent1: The complex puzzle left me feeling dizzier than ever.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected turn of events in the story left me feeling dizzier.
meanings.sent3: The nonsensical riddle made my brain feel dizzier trying to solve it.
meanings.sent4: The conflicting instructions left me feeling dizzier than a compass in a magnetic storm.
meanings.sent5: The confusing directions made me feel dizzier with each step I took.
